  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    com.digev.mp.component.IComponent
    Please see MessageHandler.
    com.digev.mp.component.IComponentConfigContext
    Please see MessageHandler.
    com.digev.mp.component.IComponentFactory
    Please see HandlerFactory.
    com.digev.mp.pipeline.IWSInfo
    Please see Message.
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.digev.fw.soap.AttachmentPart
    Please see com.soa.soap.message.SOAPMessage.
    com.digev.dems.common.DemsSoapHeader
    Please see Message.
    com.digev.dems.common.DemsSoapHeaders
    Please see Message.
    com.digev.mp.pipeline.MessageAttachment
    Please see Message.
    com.digev.fw.soap.Part
    Please see com.soa.soap.message.SOAPMessage.
    com.digev.fw.soap.SOAPMessage
    Please see com.soa.soap.message.SOAPMessage.
    com.digev.fw.soap.SOAPPart
    Please see com.soa.soap.message.SOAPMessage.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    com.soa.security.ISubjectCategory.ACCESS_SUBJECT
    This is the subject that access a web service, i.e. real user.
    com.soa.security.ISubjectCategory.AGENT_SUBJECT
    This is the subject representing an intermediatary point, i.e. application user.
    com.soa.message.MessageProperties.BINDING_FAULT_ID
    Fault identifier can be found using MessageProperties.FAULT_CODE.
    com.soa.message.MessageProperties.BINDING_FAULT_MSG
    Fault message can be found using MessageProperties.FAULT_STRING.
    com.soa.security.ISubjectCategory.LEGACY_ACCESS_SUBJECT
    This is the legacy enduser subject URI, provided for backward compatability only.
    com.soa.security.ISubjectCategory.LEGACY_AGENT_SUBJECT
    This is the legacy consumer subject URI, provided for backward compatability only.
    com.soa.security.ISubjectCategory.LEGACY_SERVICE_SUBJECT
    This is the legacy service subject URI, provided for backward compatability only.
    com.digev.fw.exception.GException.m_sDateStamp
    See public interface for alternatives.
    com.digev.fw.exception.GException.m_sStackTrace
    See public interface for alternatives.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.digev.fw.exception.GException.getAdditionalErrorMsg()
    Use setContext(Object[]) instead.
    com.digev.mp.pipeline.IWSInfo.getAlertProvider()
    This service should no longer be accessed through IWSInfo
    com.digev.fw.exception.GException.getDescription()
    The description should is now independent from the GException class. Use getErrorCode() and then use ErrorCodeBundle.getMessageKey(int) to get the key of the description message. From there use the ResourceBundle configured for the system.
    com.digev.fw.exception.GException.getDescription(long)
    The description should is now independent from the GException class. Use ErrorCodeBundle.getMessageKey(int) to get the key of the description message. From there use the ResourceBundle configured for the system.
    com.digev.fw.exception.GException.getDetails()
    Due to the support of message keys, localized messages, and the additional context associated with GExceptions, it is no longer as simple as calling one method to return a detailed message. Please read the documentation for GException to learn guidelines for generating such a message.
    com.digev.fw.exception.GException.getErrorID()
    Please use getErrorCode() instead.
    com.digev.fw.exception.GException.getErrorNumber()
    The time an exception is thrown is no longer stored with the exception. The time it takes to catch a thrown exception should be negligable so it becomes the rsponsibilty of the exception handler to note the current time. The formatting of times according to locales or timezones is also no longer part of GException. Use the standard java.text.DateFormat class for that.
    com.digev.fw.exception.GException.getInfoFromThrowable(Throwable)
    Please use Throwable.getStackTrace() instead.
    com.digev.mp.pipeline.IWSInfo.getManagementProvider()
    This service should no longer be accessed through IWSInfo
    com.soa.identity.ISearchConstraint.getMaximumEntriesReturned() 
    com.soa.identity.IGroupInfo.getMembers()
    use IdentitySource.getMembersInGroup() method
    com.digev.fw.exception.GException.getMessage() 
    com.digev.fw.exception.GException.getNestedError()
    Please use Throwable.getCause() instead.
    com.digev.fw.exception.GException.getNestedError(Class)
    Please use Throwable.getCause() instead.
    com.digev.fw.exception.GException.getNestedError(String)
    Please use Throwable.getCause() instead.
    com.digev.fw.exception.GException.getNestedError(Throwable)
    Please use Throwable.getCause() instead.
    com.digev.fw.exception.GException.getOriginalError()
    Please use getRootCause() instead.
    com.digev.mp.pipeline.IWSInfo.getRegistryProvider()
    This service should no longer be accessed through IWSInfo
    com.soa.monitor.usage.model.UsageData.getRequestDts() 
    com.digev.mp.pipeline.IWSInfo.getRequestSize() 
    com.digev.mp.pipeline.IWSInfo.getResponseSecurityDocument()
    This API is no longer supported and should NOT be used.
    com.digev.mp.pipeline.IWSInfo.getResponseSize() 
    com.digev.mp.pipeline.IWSInfo.getResponseStatus() 
    com.digev.mp.pipeline.IWSInfo.getResponseTimeInMs() 
    com.digev.fw.exception.GException.getRootErrorId()
    Please use getRootErrorCode() instead.
    com.digev.fw.exception.GException.getRootErrorMessage()
    Please use getRootCause() instead.
    com.digev.mp.pipeline.IWSInfo.getSecurityProvider()
    This service should no longer be accessed through IWSInfo
    com.digev.mp.pipeline.IWSInfo.getSecurityWorkSpace()
    This API is no longer supported and should NOT be used.
    com.digev.mp.pipeline.IWSInfo.getSharedData()
    This method will not be available in future releases. Please use the context properties available through getProperty() instead.
    com.digev.fw.exception.GException.getStackTrace(Throwable)
    Please use Throwable.getStackTrace() instead.
    com.digev.fw.exception.GException.getStackTraceString()
    Please use Throwable.printStackTrace(PrintWriter) instead.
    com.soa.identity.ISearchConstraint.getStartIndex() 
    com.digev.fw.mtp.settings.Transports.getTransportByProtocal(String)
    Use the method with correct spelling.
    com.soa.console.binding.AccessPointContext.getUddiConnectionProperties() 
    com.digev.mp.pipeline.IWSInfo.getUsageMonitorCustomField1() 
    com.digev.fw.exception.GException.getVerboseMsg()
    Due to the support of message keys, localized messages, and the additional context associated with GExceptions, it is no longer as simple as calling one method to return a verbose message. Please read the documentation for GException to learn guidelines for generating such a message.
    com.digev.fw.mtp.settings.Transports.listProtocals()
    Use listProtocols
    com.digev.dems.common.DemsSoapHeaders.loadFromXml(Document)
    This is highly inefficient. Use the DemsHeaderReader class instead.
    com.digev.dems.common.DemsSoapHeaders.loadFromXml(Document, String)
    This is highly inefficient. Use the DemsHeaderReader class instead.
    com.digev.fw.mtp.settings.Transports.loadFromXMLOldSchema(Node) 
    com.digev.fw.exception.GException.lookup(long)
    The description should is now independent from the GException class. Use ErrorCodeBundle.getMessageKey(int) to get the key of the description message. From there use the ResourceBundle configured for the system.
    com.digev.fw.exception.GException.packageException(Class, Throwable)
    Please use GException(Throwable) instead.
    com.digev.fw.exception.GException.packageException(Class, Throwable, String)
    Please use GException(String, Throwable) instead.
    com.digev.fw.exception.GException.packageException(Class, Throwable, String, long)
    Please use GException(String, int, Throwable) instead.
    com.digev.fw.exception.GException.packageException(Throwable)
    Please use GException(Throwable) instead.
    com.digev.fw.exception.GException.packageException(Throwable, String)
    Please use GException(String, Throwable) instead.
    com.digev.fw.exception.GException.packageException(Throwable, String, long)
    Please use GException(String, int, Throwable) instead.
    com.digev.fw.exception.GException.printStackTraceExtended()
    Please use Throwable.printStacktrace() instead.
    com.digev.fw.exception.GException.printStackTraceExtended(PrintStream)
    Please use Throwable.printStackTrace(PrintStream) instead.
    com.soa.identity.IGroupSearchConstraint.returnMembers() 
    com.digev.mp.pipeline.IWSInfo.setAlertProvider(IAlertProvider)
    This service should no longer be accessed through IWSInfo
    com.digev.fw.exception.GException.setDetails(String)
    Use setContext(Object[]) instead.
    com.digev.mp.pipeline.IWSInfo.setDomBuilderPool(DOMBuilderPool)
    This will not be available in future releases.
    com.digev.fw.exception.GException.setErrorID(long)
    Please use setErrorCode(ErrorCode) instead.
    com.digev.mp.pipeline.IWSInfo.setManagementProvider(IManagementProvider)
    This service should no longer be accessed through IWSInfo
    com.digev.mp.pipeline.IWSInfo.setRegistryProvider(IRegistryProvider)
    This service should no longer be accessed through IWSInfo
    com.digev.mp.pipeline.IWSInfo.setResponseStatus(int) 
    com.digev.mp.pipeline.IWSInfo.setResponseTimeInMs(long) 
    com.digev.mp.pipeline.IWSInfo.setSecurityProvider(ISecurityProvider)
    This service should no longer be accessed through IWSInfo
    com.digev.fw.exception.GException.setStackTrace(String)
    Please use Throwable.fillInStackTrace() instead.
    com.digev.mp.pipeline.IWSInfo.setUsageMonitorCustomField1(String) 
    com.digev.fw.log.Log.startTraceBlock(long, String)
    Please use Log.startTraceBlock(String)
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    com.soa.security.AuthenticationException(long)
    The use of integer based error codes has been discontinued.
    com.soa.security.AuthenticationException(String, long)
    The use of hard-coded string messages and integer based error codes has been discontinued.
    com.soa.security.AuthenticationException(Throwable, long)
    The use of integer based error codes has been discontinued.
    com.soa.security.AuthenticationException(Throwable, String)
    The use of hard-coded string messages has been discontinued.
    com.soa.security.AuthenticationException(Throwable, String, long)
    The use of hard-coded string messages and integer based error codes has been discontinued.
    com.soa.security.AuthenticationException(Throwable, String, Long)
    The use of hard-coded string messages and integer based error codes has been discontinued.
    com.soa.security.AuthorizationException(long)
    The use of integer based error codes has been discontinued.
    com.soa.security.AuthorizationException(String)
    The use of hard-coded string messages has been discontinued.
    com.soa.security.AuthorizationException(String, long)
    The use of hard-coded string messages and integer based error codes has been discontinued.
    com.soa.security.AuthorizationException(Throwable, long)
    The use of integer based error codes has been discontinued.
    com.soa.security.AuthorizationException(Throwable, String)
    The use of hard-coded string messages has been discontinued.
    com.soa.security.AuthorizationException(Throwable, String, long)
    The use of hard-coded string messages and integer based error codes has been discontinued.
    com.soa.security.AuthorizationException(Throwable, String, Long)
    The use of hard-coded string messages and integer based error codes has been discontinued.
    com.digev.fw.exception.GException(long)
    Please use GException(ErrorCode) instead.
    com.digev.fw.exception.GException(String)
    Please use GException(ErrorCode) instead.
    com.digev.fw.exception.GException(String, long)
    Please use GException(String, ErrorCode) instead.
    com.digev.fw.exception.GException(Throwable)
    Please use GException(ErrorCode, Throwable) instead.
    com.digev.fw.exception.GException(Throwable, long)
    Please use GException(Throwable, ErrorCode) instead.
    com.digev.fw.exception.GException(Throwable, String)
    Please use GException(String, int, Throwable) instead.
    com.digev.fw.exception.GException(Throwable, String, long)
    Please use GException(String, ErrorCode, Throwable) instead.
    com.digev.fw.exception.GException(Throwable, String, Long)
    Please use GException(String, ErrorCode, Throwable) instead.
    com.soa.security.spi.InvalidConfigurationException(long)
    The use of integer based error codes has been discontinued.
    com.soa.security.spi.InvalidConfigurationException(String)
    The use of hard-coded string messages has been discontinued.
    com.soa.security.spi.InvalidConfigurationException(String, long)
    The use of hard-coded string messages and integer based error codes has been discontinued.
    com.soa.security.spi.InvalidConfigurationException(Throwable, long)
    The use of integer based error codes has been discontinued.
    com.soa.security.spi.InvalidConfigurationException(Throwable, String)
    The use of hard-coded string messages has been discontinued.
    com.soa.security.spi.InvalidConfigurationException(Throwable, String, long)
    The use of hard-coded string messages and integer based error codes has been discontinued.
    com.soa.security.spi.InvalidConfigurationException(Throwable, String, Long)
    The use of hard-coded string messages and integer based error codes has been discontinued.
